properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "procdump" or ((ProcessCommandLine contains " -ma " or ProcessCommandLine contains " /ma " or ProcessCommandLine contains " -mp " or ProcessCommandLine contains " /mp ") and (ProcessCommandLine contains " -accepteula" or ProcessCommandLine contains " /accepteula"))) and (not((FolderPath endswith "\\procdump.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\procdump64.exe")))

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects the execution of a renamed ProcDump executable.
This often done by attackers or malware in order to evade defensive mechanisms.
